title: Congaree National Park: Calendar
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar            Calendar           Keyword       By Date     Start Date      End Date          Search         Upcoming Events    Showing 5 results    Show ALL instances of recurring events   RSS Feed      Congaree National Park Introduction to the Cedar Creek Canoe Trail      Time: 1:30 PM to 3:30 PM Location: South Cedar Creek Canoe Landing Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join a park ranger for a 30 minute canoe trip on the Cedar Creek Canoe Trail. (No reservations required) View Details      Congaree National Park Nature Discovery Walk      Time: 9:30 AM to 11:30 AM Location: Harry Hampton Visitor Center Fees: FREE     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join a park volunteer on a guided boardwalk walk to explore the forest, looking and listening for animals. View Details      Congaree National Park Wilderness Canoe Tour (August 2016)      Time: 9:30 AM to 12:30 PM Location: Congaree National Park Fees: Free     Sunday, August 14, 2016 Join a ranger for a paddle through the old-growth forest. Reservations are required and can be made online. See event description for more details. View Details      Congaree National Park Wilderness Canoe Tour (September 2016)      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Congaree National Park Fees: Free     Friday, September 2, 2016 Join a ranger for a paddle through the old-growth forest. Reservations are required and can be made online. See event description for more details. View Details      Congaree National Park Big Tree Hike      Time: 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM Location: Harry Hampton Visitor Center Fees: FREE     Saturday, September 10, 2016 Every 2nd Saturday of every month. from 03/12/2016 to 11/12/2016 Discover Congaree National Park's primeval forested floodplain. Experience the extraordinarily diverse wildlife while walking among the towering trees.  View Details
